Package sudoku

Class Sudoku

  • java.lang.Object
    • sudoku.Sudoku
  • public class Sudoku
extends java.lang.Object
    Sudoku represents a sudoku grid and has methods for generating, modifying and solving games.
    Author:
    Johannes Skogman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Sudoku()
      Class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clearBoard()
      Method for clearing all cell values on the board.
      int getCell​(int row, int col)
      Getter method for accessing specific cells on the board.
      void randomize()
      Generates a random, solvable configuration of the board with 20 non-empty cells.
      void randomize​(int nbrOfCells)
      Generates a random, solvable configuration of the board.
      void setCell​(int row, int col, int value)
      Setter method for setting the value of a cell.
      void showBoard()
      Prints the current board state to the console.
      boolean solve()
      Generates a solution for the board if a solution exists, otherwise leaves the board as is.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sudoku

        public Sudoku()
        Class constructor. Initializes the board with empty cells.

    • Method Detail

      • getCell

        public int getCell​(int row,
                   int col)
        Getter method for accessing specific cells on the board.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the cell
        col - the column of the cell
        Returns:
        the value of the cell at (row, col) on the board

      • setCell

        public void setCell​(int row,
                    int col,
                    int value)
        Setter method for setting the value of a cell.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the cell
        col - the column of the cell
        value - the value assigned to the cell

      • clearBoard

        public void clearBoard()
        Method for clearing all cell values on the board.

      • randomize

        public void randomize​(int nbrOfCells)
        Generates a random, solvable configuration of the board. This method can potentially take a long time to execute.
        Parameters:
        nbrOfCells - the number of non-empty cells left on the board

      • randomize

        public void randomize()
        Generates a random, solvable configuration of the board with 20 non-empty cells. See randomize(int).

      • solve

        public boolean solve()
        Generates a solution for the board if a solution exists, otherwise leaves the board as is. The solver can potentially take a long time to execute.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if a solution exists or not

      • showBoard

        public void showBoard()
        Prints the current board state to the console. Empty cells are represented by "-".
